features: These clear Safety 1st plastic covers install easily and fit over your stove knobs to keep children from turning them. Simply pop open the cover's hinged lid to access the knob when it's time to cook.
Easily confirm whether a stove burner is on or off with the clear, see-through lids.
Each knob is made from durable, heat-resistant plastic to resist wear and hold up to repeated use.
These plastic safety covers feature a universal design and are oversized to fit the knobs of most modern appliances.
This set includes five stove knob covers.
Safety 1st Child Proof Clear View Stove Knob Covers are for indoor use only.
Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments so you enjoy every “first” your child experiences.
body.description: Product Description Keep curious kids away from dangerous stove knobs with Safety 1st Child Proof Clear View Stove Knob Covers. These clear plastic covers install easily and fit over your stove knobs to keep children from turning them. Simply pop open the covers hinged lid to access the knob when it's time to cook. Easily confirm whether a stove burner is on or off with the stove safety knob cover's clear, see-through lids. These stove knob covers are made from durable, heat-resistant plastic to resist wear and hold up to repeated use. Featuring a universal design, these plastic safety stove knob covers are oversized to fit the knobs of most modern appliances. This set includes five stove knob covers. Safety 1st Child Proof Clear View Stove Knob Covers are for indoor use only. Safety 1st believes parenting should have fewer worries and more joyful moments. As the first and only leader in child safety, Safety 1st is here to give you peace of mind so you can spend less time worrying and more time enjoying every first you experience with your child. Before using broiler, completely remove stove knob covers to prevent damage from heat. To access stove knob, press back grip tab and lift cover. Brand Story By From the Manufacturer The Safety 1st plastic Clear View Stove Knob Covers are designed to help prevent kitchen accidents by prohibiting children from turning on the stove. The hinged lid allows parents convenient access to stove knobs, without removing the product. New larger size will accommodate today's stoves. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Safety 1st Over 30 years ago, the little yellow Safety 1st Baby On Board sign became a badge of pride for new parents. Soon after, Safety 1st launched the first true collection of home safety products and established themselves as the leader in child safety. This role has grown over the years as Safety 1st continues to introduce new and innovative products to parents, consistently giving parents the power to keep their children safe. Safety 1st Child-Proof Clear View Stove Knob Covers Child Proof Your Kitchen Range Help keep your stove knobs off-limits with Clear View Stove Knob Covers from Safety 1st. Young children love to explore and find knobs fascinating. These child-proof, clear stove knob covers help protect curious minds from danger while parents aren't looking. A hinged lid allows for easy adult access when needed while the transparent knobs allows for clear indication that your stove burners are safely in the off position. Tool-Free Installation Universal design fits most ranges Hinged lid for convenience Durable and heat-resistant Easy, non-adhesive attachment

Protect Your Family and Home These clear Safety 1st plastic covers install easily and fit over your stove knobs to keep children from turning them. Simply pop open the cover's hinged lid to access the knob when it's time to cook. Each knob is made from durable, heat-resistant plastic to resist wear and hold up to repeated use. These plastic safety covers feature a universal design and are oversized to fit the knobs of most modern appliances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were easy to install on my stove.No issues with these, works well to baby/toddler proof .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to buy these because my 2-year-old kept messing with the knobs. They arrived quick and they were easy to install. They're not hard to open and close while cooking for adults and they're hard for kids to mess with. I also like that I can throw them in the dishwasher, and they don't get warped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again, and have. Other types have not worked out.
reviews.reviewText: The clamshell design has been great.The Safety 1st, since it wraps behind the knob, works in a very simple and robust way: pull off your stove's knob, open the safety clamshell and place the metal spindle of the stove knob through its hole, and replace the stove knob on the spindle. Close the clamshell and you are done.I tried some other brands that I would not buy again. For those, the safety mechanism was more complex and depended on the oven knob being prevented from being pushed in before turning. That's when I noticed my burner knobs work that way (push in, then turn), but my single oven knob did not need to be pushed in to turn. Therefore that other brand didn't work on my oven knob, and even on my burner knobs, there was a problem: this kind of mechanism requires on part of the safety unit to be securely stuck to the stove with adhesive, and those on my burner knobs inevitably became loose and came off in short order. Therefore I have repeated my purchase of the Safety 1st clamshell design instead.There are two minor inconvenicnces, forwhich I rate as minor but took away a star:1) The hinge on the clamshell is somewhat vulnerable to heat. Therefore if I broil with the oven cracked open, the bottom side of the safety knobs (facing the oven top) become hot. After a few months, the hinge area become soft-- if bumped awkwardly, they may come apart while hot, otherwise will slowly deteriorate over months. To prevent this, I no longer broil with the oven door held open, and I also rotate all five covers so the hinge faces up away from the oven heat. This problem is not as bad as it seems-- by the time a year or so goes by, the knobs can get dirty (being exposed to stove splatter), so cosmetically I'm happy changing them out.2) In real life use, sometimes you may leave the clamshells open. When open, these hang downward. Depending on your oven, if you open and close your oven, the top of your oven door lip or handle may catch, so if you slam the oven door, it'll crack the hinge off the clamshell. Has only happened twice in two years to me.For the reasons above I just buy a spare set, and once every 4 months or so a single unit breaks, so I replace that from the spare set. I don't mind-- it works and does what it's supposed to do, and would not buy another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so thankful I got these. We just got a new kitten who loves to explore. Our stove knobs are super sensitive and even a bit of movement could cause gas leaks. These are big enough that if someone bumped into them, they wouldn’t be close to moving the dial, and they’re super easy to use. Honestly it probably saved us from a bad gas leak. And it makes me feel more safe in case I bump into it. Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but effective
reviews.reviewText: Work great! I have an autistic child and these are great for stove safety at any age.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product but doesnt fit all stoves
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got these stove covers because our stove knobs are easy to accidentally turn on gas without actually lighting the stove on. Product seems like it would be good to prevent accidentally turning knobs but because it fits our stove wayyy too loose it feels more dangerous knowing our toddler can just pull the whole thing off. Maybe with comand strips it would be more sturdy. Not sure if Im going to return due to it not safely fitting my stove. The covers themselves seem good hard material, the clear makes it not noticable, and it opens/closes easily after the first few tries straight out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps dog from turning on gas
reviews.reviewText: Yes, you read that correctly, my dog knows how to turn on the gas. These are absolutely necessary for our household and they work great! Sure, anyone with a kid should have these, but no one ever thinks about the dog until it actually happens.
Worked as described. Very easy to install
Buen producto, súper seguro para los niños.

passen nicht bei unserem herd weil zu gross. ausserdem muss man die knöpfe so fest drauf stecken, dass man diese dann mit dem riesen aufsatz drehen und somit den !elektroherd" aufdrehen kann. sogar noch besser weil man dadurch ein höheres drehmoment hat... also vollkommen ungeeignet ausser für gasherd wo die knöpfe einen gewissen abstand haben.

I put these on my gas stove half a year ago and my son has yet figure them out! They are perfect! Easy to open/close as an adult but so far it’s been the only safety lock that my toddler hasn’t opened or broken. Highly recommend!

Excelente precio, producto fáciles de instalar y maniobrar para abrir y cerrar cuando sea necesario.4 años después, siguen funcionando de maravilla, a pesar de haber recibido innumerables golpes accidentales al estar abiertos, no se han roto. Estupendamente recomendables
